author: Staff Reporter
text:
Coimbatore Corporation on Saturday fined a private company Rs. 25,000 for dumping debris in Valangulam. A release from the civic body said that following information from a member of the public, the health wing officials rushed to the spot and found the driver of a small goods carrier dumping debris in Valangulam. They seized the driving license of the driver and initiated proceedings.

Based on inputs, the Commissioner levied the fine.
title: Firm fined for dumping debris in Valangulam
